TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ToolStripDropDownCloseReason extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the reason that a control was closed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownCloseReason AppClicked = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the control was closed because an application was launched.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownCloseReason AppFocusChange = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the control was closed because another application has received the focus.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownCloseReason CloseCalled = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the control was closed because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Close%2A> method was called.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownCloseReason ItemClicked = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the control was closed because one of its items was clicked.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownCloseReason Keyboard = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the control was closed because of keyboard activity, such as the ESC key being pressed.
